title: Conservation of angular momentum - child platform

content.prompt: A child is standing near the edge of a rotating platform, as shown in Figure 1. The child-platform system is freely rotating with negligible friction around a central axle. The child then slowly walks directly to the center of the platform, as shown in Figure 2. Which of the following correctly states the change, if any, of the angular speed of the platform as the child walks to the center of the platform?

choices.label: The angular speed does not change.
The angular speed decreases to zero.
The angular speed decreases but remains greater than zero.

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
